summary: One day, Jenny discovers that she doesn't love her boyfriend - a Japanese triad leader - any longer; therefore, she walks away with a bag of money to secure her life. In reality, that bag ... See full summary »
cast: Tony Ka Fai Leung|Leslie Cheung|Faye Wong|Stephanie Che|Asuka Higuchi|Masaya Katô|Vincent Kok|Gigi Lai
title: Lian zhan Chong Cheng
